constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 110 (Thursday, June 24, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PERLMUTTER:
H.R. 4155.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H3135]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Green Neighborhoods Act of 2021
